settings.title: Free shipping and free returns on orders
settings.text: We have a quick and easy 30-day return or exchange policy as well as a one-year guarantee for our lenses; if anything happens to them, we'll replace your lenses for free.

settings.newsletter_richtext: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.newsletter_text: Sign up for our monthly newsletter to access our membership club and receive exclusive discounts.

settings.title: A new point of view
settings.subtitle: keeping eyewear accessible and affordable, while still looking and feeling your best!

settings.title: How it all started
settings.text:
Designer eyewear can be expensive, vintage eyewear can be expensive – eyewear in general can be expensive. This was our problem to solve when we started creating our company. We wanted to have frames inspired by contemporary designers and also vintage styles – but for less so everyone could afford them!

However, one thing that we would not waiver on was quality. How do you make eyewear affordable while maintaining top notch quality you ask? Cutting out the middlemen and designing, manufacturing everything in house, and dealing directly with our customers!

settings.title: Behind the scenes
settings.subtitle: Take a look at our process

settings.title: Think BIG & embrace creativity
settings.text:
We work with some of the most imaginative minds in the biz, whether these are our employees, stakeholders, customers or partners. We always welcome an open conversation with different perspectives.

We love what we do and genuinely care about everyone involved. We think of ourselves as a family. Think you'd be a good fit? Give us a shout. We're always looking for great people who share our passion.

settings.title: We'd love to hear from you!
settings.content_text:
Although our brick and mortar shop isn't open, our team is all working from their home office so we're ready to respond to any inquiries!

Need frame advice? Want to try on a pair *virtually*? Give us a shout! Have questions about your order, shipping & return policies? Check our FAQ page to see if your question has alreadybeen answered. For any partnership or collaboration inquiries, please reach our to our studio team here.

settings.newsletter_richtext: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.title: Heading
settings.text: Text area can be used for details about blog authors or general information.

settings.title: Heading
settings.text: Text area can be used for details about blog authors or general information.

settings.title: Can I add my prescription to my frames?
settings.answer: Yes you can! When placing an order, you can attach your prescription information. If you forget, not to worry – just follow up on your order with an email so we can get it sorted!

settings.title: What if I scratch my lenses? Is there any sort of warranty?
settings.answer: All eyewear (glasses and sunglasses) come with a 1-year warranty. If anything happens to them, let us know and we can hook you up with a replacement or repair.

settings.title: Can I use my insurance to buy prescription eyewear?
settings.answer: Yes you can! After you've purchased your frame, you'll need to make a claim and submit your receipt to your insurance provider. Insurance plans and instructions may vary.

settings.title: What if I don't like my frames once I receive them?
settings.answer: We offer 14-day exchanges or refunds, so if you aren't happy with our frames you can choose one of those options.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: We do! Shipping is on us, always. We offer free return shipping too.

settings.title: How long does it take for my order to ship?
settings.answer: Within Canada, allow for 1 - 3 business days to receive your order. Within the U.S, allow for up to 10 business days to receive your order.

settings.title: Where is the company based out of?
settings.answer: Our company is owned & operated out of NYC! All of our eyewear is sourced & manufactured in the state of New York too.

settings.title: I'd like to work for you!
settings.answer: Thanks for your interest! We're always looking for great people to join our team. Drop us an email through out contact page with your resume and a bit about yourself.

settings.title: Get in touch today
settings.content_text: We're always happy to chat and help answer any questions you may have! Please note, we try our best to respond to all inquiries within 48 hours, Monday - Friday from 9 am - 9pm EST.

settings.html_content: Sign up for our newsletter

settings.title: Get a professional opinion
settings.text: Send us your picture for a personal recommendation.

settings.heading: Free Global Delivery
settings.subheading: Orders will normally be delivered within 5 to 7 working days

settings.heading: CONSULT WITH OUR DESIGNER
settings.subheading: Get a better look and save time with a consultation before making your purchase.

settings.heading: SUSTAINABILITY PROMISE
settings.subheading: WE RECYCLE MORE THAN 3 TONS OF VINYL EACH YEAR. ALL OUR PARTS AND MATERIALS ARE SOURCED FROM THE NEAREST SUPPLIER.

settings.content:
Sculpted by hand, curved in the oven and held together with cigar box hinges. The first Vinylize frame was made from a 12" vinyl pilfered from his father's record collection.

Since 2004 Vinylize has been framing faces one record at a time. More than 40 tons have been repurposed to create stunning eyewear that stand the test of time. Wear a piece of music history.

settings.title: HANDCRAFTED
settings.content: Today, every frame is handmade in the heart of Europe by a team of 16 people. The first step is to select the grooves.

settings.heading: SIGN UP
settings.small_label: AND BE THE FIRST TO KNOW ABOUT LIMITED EDITIONS, COLLABORATIONS AND DEALS.
settings.info: BUT, IT’S ALWAYS HANDY TO HAVE AS MUCH PROTECTION AS POSSIBLE. REGISTER YOUR VINYLIZE FOR AN EXTRA YEAR’S GUARANTEE. YOU CAN COUNT ON FREE REPAIRS (NOT SHIPPING). YOU’LL ALSO RECEIVE UPDATES ON ALL THE LATEST DEVELOPMENTS AT VINYLIZE.
settings.copyright2: Wear the music. Handmade in Europe.

settings.title: Optical frames
settings.text: Music is to humanity what these frames are to you.

settings.title: Optical
settings.text: Stand up and check our collection of sunglasses.

settings.content:
Vinylize is pushing the boundaries of design with the launch of our latest collection: CYKLO. This cutting-edge product line is a testament to our commitment to upcycling. In addition, it’s a nod to the timeless engineering of the bicycle brake cable, a concept first patented by George Larkin in 1902.

A Bold New Vision in Sustainable Eyewear
What sets CYKLO apart? We craft the eyeglass temples from actual recycled bicycle brake cables.
